pkmkdoc.description: This package let you install the required files and folders that Xcode need to create new Objective-J classes and categories.

choice.title: Objective-J Category
choice.description: This component installs a Objective-J category file template.

choice.title: Objective-J Class
choice.description: This component installs a set of Objective-J class file templates.

requirement.message: It seems that you haven't installed a valid Xcode version! This package will be only available for Xcode version >= 4.3. Below this version Xcode is installed in the "/Developer" folder of the systems root. At Xcode version >= 4.3 the file template system has changed.
